PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-08182016-09-23,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  , 
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Standard 214)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (Standard 214) in order to (1) update Canada’s side impact protection requirements by adopting the requirements of the United States Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard 214; and (2) fulfill Canada’s commitment to the Regulatory Cooperation Council, ensuring alignment of Canadian and the United States regulations for side impact, thus minimizing cost to both manufacturers and consumers, while providing a high level of safety.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0254 Publication Date: 2016-10-05
Attachments
